title: Not receiving IP for games
body: Hi i'm having problem with ip, i won 2 games at aram both gained me +42 ip, however on my ip balance its not added, games are in match history and even there says +42 ip on both, i noticed this because i want to buy Kayne for 7800 and i had 7704 before these 2 games and still have the same amount.

replies.body: Im scared to play more because i have first win of the day bonus, but dont want to waste 200+ ip if the problem is still there, and i cant find a way to test it...

Sometimes it can take a little bit for your currency totals to correctly update if you've been playing a lot of back to back games recently. Try refreshing your client really quickly to try and force an update, but if that doesn't work hit me back up tomorrow if you still don't have that IP!
i noticed i gained 1 ip over night but still missing rest, i tried re login, and refreshing but it doesn't do anything
